evidence.claim: North Shore at Home complies with HIPAA regulations for health information.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
HL7 protocols are referenced within their data handling guidelines.
Security measures protecting sensitive health information are emphasized in their operational standards.
They provide services that require EDI X12 compliance in healthcare transactions.
North Shore at Home is involved with EHR integrations, promoting better patient data sharing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI transactions on their site.
